channel.title: SCAR a good first language?
channel.description:
Well SCAR looks relatively easier than most of the other languages in some parts and was wondering if I should give this a go before java and C++?
[size=7pt]I'll be learning computer programming next year, what my teacher told me but I'm not sure what language.[/size]

item.title: SCAR a good first language?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

At first I thought this sounded stupid.

However: Pascal was designed as a teaching language, and that’s one of the only things it got right. You’d also be writing “useful” (to you, anyway) programs right off the bat, relatively easy. So sure, why not.

Read full topic
